cantilever_beam_distributed_load.png.description: Cantilever beam with fixed support at left end and distributed load q along length, showing EJ stiffness and length ℓ

cantilever_beam_torsional_moment.png.description: Cantilever beam with fixed support at left, distributed moment load mt along length, applied moment θ̄ at right end, showing GJ torsional stiffness and length ℓ

cantilever_beam_elastic_foundation.png.description: Cantilever beam with fixed support at left, elastic foundation with stiffness k along length, point load P at right end, showing length ℓ

simply_supported_beam_variable_stiffness.description: Simply supported beam with pin supports at both ends, showing variable stiffness EJ(x) and length ℓ

cantilever_beam_tip_mass.png.description: Cantilever beam with fixed support at left, concentrated mass M at right end, showing EJ stiffness and length ℓ

cantilever_beam_point_load.png.description: Cantilever beam with fixed support at left and point load P at free end

cantilever_beam_uniform_load.png.description: Cantilever beam with fixed support at left and distributed load q along length

two_span_continuous_beam.png.description: Two-span continuous beam with pin supports at three locations, showing EJ and Io properties for each span with lengths ℓ and αℓ
